name: A simple platinum headband
data: It increases the users strength pathetically.
It increases the users dexterity poorly.
It increases the users constitution pitifully.
It has tiny armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration pitifully.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration pitifully.
It increases the users physical resistance somewhat.
It increases the users magical resistance adequately.
It increases the users electric resistance adequately.
This item loses its magical powers somewhat faster than avarage.
